channel.title: 1.8 update (Sever Question)
channel.description: I was just wondering with the 1.8 update coming along if the sever is thinking of a sever restart or has away to patching all the new updates in or is just going to be left how it is.

item.title: 1.8 update (Sever Question)
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

[quote=“Nokturth, post:9, topic:412997”][quote author=317guy link=topic=514471.msg3735308#msg3735308 date=1314914876]

when notch said the new stuff wont be in current maps he meant currently generated chunks but new chunks will have new stuff

Thankyou i was jjust a bit worried about it but i have been to x-10000 and x6000 before for these new updates everyones going to have to go like 15000 + or - just to see all this
[/quote]

in the server map shows all not generated chunks.

also, there could be a new station in the new spawn and an old station in the old spawn.
that will make things a lot easier =D[/quote]
Tbh, railway was a pain, not sure if it can be managed…

Read full topic

item.title: 1.8 update (Sever Question)
item.dc:creator: @Travas Travas
item.description:
@Travas wrote:

xx matty xx:

I don’t think track griefing has been that much of an issue in the current world? It’s annoying, but tracks should be rolled back pretty quickly IF the staff stick to their promises of being active.

Read full topic

item.title: 1.8 update (Sever Question)
item.dc:creator: @noobs_are_ftw noobs are ftw
item.description:
@noobs_are_ftw wrote:

[quote=“Nokturth, post:15, topic:412997”][quote author=noobs are ftw link=topic=514471.msg3743889#msg3743889 date=1315604640]

when notch said the new stuff wont be in current maps he meant currently generated chunks but new chunks will have new stuff

Thankyou i was jjust a bit worried about it but i have been to x-10000 and x6000 before for these new updates everyones going to have to go like 15000 + or - just to see all this

in the server map shows all not generated chunks.

also, there could be a new station in the new spawn and an old station in the old spawn.
that will make things a lot easier =D

Yeah, until newfags come and destroy it

it’ll be a 3000 long rail at least, you need to have less than no life to grief it

water breaks rails its easy to grief

res it all?

we dont have unlimited rails
[/quote]

whoever wants the railway can donate, when 1.8 comes i’ll be glad to help[/quote]

wow i shouldnt go online when im tired meant to say unlimited res…

Read full topic

whoever wants the railway can donate, when 1.8 comes i’ll be glad to help

item.title: 1.8 update (Sever Question)
item.dc:creator: @317guy 317guy
item.description:
@317guy wrote:

Moparisthebest:

When 1.8 comes out we will move the spawn to a newly generated section so people can explore from there.

Okay then sounds fair enough

Read full topic

item.title: 1.8 update (Sever Question)
item.dc:creator: @mironic mironic
item.description:
@mironic wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:6, topic:412997”]When 1.8 comes out we will move the spawn to a newly generated section so people can explore from there.[/quote] can you add a /spawn back? so people who are in the old areas can get resources to?

not really you went that far in 1 direction and more than likely in a strait line so all someone else has to do is either go in a diff direction or go in the same direction just at a much higher or lower to the left or right (or north or south depending on the direction)
